data: {"concept_id": "clause", "concept_name": "Clause", "set": "Grammar & Punctuation", "type": "unit", "definition": "A subject–verb idea unit. Clauses come in independent (can stand alone) and dependent (cannot stand alone) forms.", "axes": "kind|composition|linkage|density|order", "axis_values": "independent|dependent | simple|layered | coord|subord|juxtaposed | low|medium|high | lead|mid|tail", "learning_goals": "identify|combine|vary|diagnose_errors|revise", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_kind_ind", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "kind:independent", "description": "Contains a subject and a finite verb; expresses a complete thought.", "detection_hint": "‘She left.’ ‘The storm broke at midnight.’", "false_positive_risks": "Fragment mistaken for clause.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_kind_dep", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "kind:dependent", "description": "Has subject+verb but is introduced by a subordinator; feels unfinished without an IC.", "detection_hint": "‘When she arrives…’ ‘Because it rained…’", "false_positive_risks": "Comma splice that treats DC as IC.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_comp_simple", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "composition:simple", "description": "Bare subject+finite verb with minimal modifiers.", "detection_hint": "‘He ran.’ ‘They waited.’", "false_positive_risks": "Verbals (gerund/infinitive) misread as finite verb.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_comp_layer", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "composition:layered", "description": "Subject+finite verb expanded by phrases/embedded clauses.", "detection_hint": "‘She ran through the alley, gasping for air.’", "false_positive_risks": "Pile of phrases without a finite verb.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_link_coord", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "linkage:coord", "description": "Two ICs joined with a coordinating conjunction (FANBOYS) or semicolon.", "detection_hint": "‘I stayed, and she left.’ ‘I stayed; she left.’", "false_positive_risks": "Comma splice between ICs with no conjunction.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_link_subord", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "linkage:subord", "description": "DC + IC or IC + DC linked by a subordinator (because, when, although, if…).", "detection_hint": "‘Because it rained, we stayed.’ ‘We stayed because it rained.’", "false_positive_risks": "Dangling subordinator creating fragment.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_link_juxta", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "linkage:juxtaposed", "description": "Separate ICs with a period for punch or with a dash for snap.", "detection_hint": "‘He opened the door. The room was empty.’", "false_positive_risks": "Run-on with no punctuation or link.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_density", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "density", "description": "Number of clauses per sentence controls rhythm; higher density slows/loads, low density speeds/simplifies.", "detection_hint": "Count IC/DC units; check reversibility of effects.", "false_positive_risks": "Overstuffed clause chains with no hierarchy.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_order_lead", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "order:lead", "description": "DC placed first for suspense/setup.", "detection_hint": "‘When the lights flicker, run.’", "false_positive_risks": "Weak IC payoff after heavy setup.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "signal_id": "sig_order_tail", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "order:tail", "description": "DC placed last for explanation/balance.", "detection_hint": "‘Run when the lights flicker.’", "false_positive_risks": "Redundant DC that repeats IC.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "error_id": "fragment", "description": "Lacks a finite verb or subject; DC alone presented as a sentence.", "fixit": "Add missing subject/finite verb or attach DC to an IC.", "example_fix": "‘When I arrived.’ → ‘When I arrived, the room was empty.’", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "error_id": "run_on", "description": "Two ICs jammed together with no proper link/punctuation.", "fixit": "Separate with period/semicolon or add a coordinating conjunction.", "example_fix": "‘She arrived she sat.’ → ‘She arrived; she sat.’", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "error_id": "comma_splice", "description": "Two ICs linked with comma but no coordinating conjunction.", "fixit": "Add conjunction, replace with semicolon, or split into two sentences.", "example_fix": "‘She arrived, she sat.’ → ‘She arrived, and she sat.’", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"concept_id": "clause", "error_id": "mis_subordination", "description": "Using subordinator where coordination is needed (or vice versa).", "fixit": "Choose link that matches meaning (because/although/if vs and/but/or).", "example_fix": "‘Because she arrived, and she sat.’ → pick one relation.", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_clause_identify", "concept_id": "clause", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Underline or tag each clause; mark IC vs DC.", "expected_features": "Correctly tags IC/DC; cites subordinator or completeness.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "All clauses tagged with justification", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Frequent misses"}, "distractor_strategy": "Include lines with verbals to bait false ICs.", "hint_steps": "1) Find finite verb 2) Find subject 3) Decide IC/DC 4) Check links", "variation_axes": "kind|linkage", "difficulty": 1, "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_clause_fix_fragments", "concept_id": "clause", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Repair fragments by adding a finite verb/subject or attaching to a nearby IC.", "expected_features": "Fixes preserve meaning and rhythm; punctuation/legal links correct.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "All fragments fixed elegantly", "Meets": "Most fixed", "Developing": "New errors introduced"}, "distractor_strategy": "DC masquerading as sentence.", "hint_steps": "1) Identify missing piece 2) Attach or complete 3) Recheck rhythm", "variation_axes": "fragment|run_on|comma_splice", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_clause_rhythm_variation", "concept_id": "clause", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Rewrite a paragraph varying clause density and order for impact.", "expected_features": "Intentional pacing shifts; suspense vs punch demonstrated.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear, effective pacing palette", "Meets": "Some variation", "Developing": "Monotone"}, "distractor_strategy": "Over-long chains with no payoff.", "hint_steps": "1) Add a hammer IC 2) Front-load one DC 3) Build one cascade", "variation_axes": "density|order", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_clause_1", "concept_id": "clause", "label": "strong", "axis_value": "IC", "text": "‘The glass shattered.’", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_clause_2", "concept_id": "clause", "label": "strong", "axis_value": "DC+IC", "text": "‘Because the lights flickered, we ran.’", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_clause_3", "concept_id": "clause", "label": "strong", "axis_value": "IC;IC", "text": "‘He waited; she never came.’", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_clause_weak_1", "concept_id": "clause", "label": "weak", "axis_value": "fragment", "text": "‘Because the storm.’", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_clause_weak_2", "concept_id": "clause", "label": "weak", "axis_value": "comma_splice", "text": "‘She arrived, she sat.’", "source_file": "Clause.md", "source_md5": "7fa0135df716d5df9bbb5df7f3250396", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T19:00:48.384985Z"}
